projects.title: Easy VO<sub>2</sub> Max (app)
projects.subtitle: Low-cost solution for measuring VO<sub>2</sub> consumption directly
projects.description: Modern Desktop app that connects to a custom-made mask through Wi-Fi and the WebSocket protocol and calculates VO<sub>2</sub> consumption during exercise directly using the Bernoulli Equation and the Haldane Effect. There's minimal set-up, the system is easy to use, intuitive and flexible, supporting multiple profiles, data export and import and more.

projects.title: Easy VO<sub>2</sub> Max (ESP8266 device)
projects.subtitle: Low-cost solution for measuring VO<sub>2</sub> consumption directly
projects.description: ESP8266-powered wireless mask that collects O<sub>2</sub> and breath data and sends it to a remote desktop app for processing.

projects.title: IT Inventory System
projects.description: Fully functional Open Source Web app to manage the inventory, clients, work orders, employees/users and products of a fictional IT/tech support company. The front-end of the application was made in React, while its back-end was with .NET + SQL Server using Entity Framework. Supports authentication and different levels of access.
